data.text:
@2ndNewMoon @VanessaBeeley @WrecklessGamer The University and the Police HQ in old university Building are next door to each other were both hit and both on fire. Curious & chilling how some are so desperate to absolve Putin of guilt for mass murder they will never condemn. 
Are they Siloviki funded?
@2ndNewMoon @WrecklessGamer @VanessaBeeley The West Media simply don't care... Hopeless.
@PaulDBedson @2ndNewMoon Indeed, have to keep an open mind. This is certainly a "war" of disinformation.
@curiousrabbit66 @2ndNewMoon A university conveniently next to the Secret Services Building? Wonder what they study there?
@curiousrabbit66 @2ndNewMoon I'm reading Ukrainian sources that it got hit but you probably can't trust those either. The SBU building is the one I would hit though. https://t.co/fG6QoPKZFZ

@PaulDBedson @2ndNewMoon And this appears to be the building (if it's the same one in question). A university.
https://t.co/zdh6zuG1Eh

@PaulDBedson @2ndNewMoon True not to trust either. But the SBU building appears to be opposite/nextdoor to the building in question. 
https://t.co/tPhuoX7EXP
@2ndNewMoon @WrecklessGamer @VanessaBeeley That's so crazy that the BBC called it a university. That's possibly the craziest bit of fake news all day.
